### What is this?

This is a landing page template for a SaaS product. The template is built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Framer Motion.

### Who is this for?

You are looking to launch a new SaaS product but don't want to spend time on learning frontend or figuring out how to design.

### Why should I use this?

- ✅ Save 500+ hours of work
- ✅ No need to learn advanced animations
- ✅ Easy to configure and change
- ✅ 1-click download and setup.
- ✅ 5 minutes to update the text and images.
- ✅ Deploy live to vercel

### Features

- 1x Landing Page with 14 sections
  - Header Section
  - Hero Section
  - Logos Section
  - Problem Section
  - Solution Section
  - How It Works Section
  - Testimonial Highlight Section
  - Features Section
  - Testimonials Section
  - Pricing Section
  - FAQ Section
  - Blog Section
  - CTA Section
  - Footer Section
- 1x Blog using MDX
- Dark mode support
- 100% Mobile responsive
- Full SEO coverage
- Dynamic OpenGraph images for every page
- Tons of animations / micro-interactions
- Clean and maintainable code
- Global constants and variables for color, text, and more

### Dependencies

- Next.js 14
- React 18.3
- TypeScript 5
- TailwindCSS 3.4
- Framer Motion 11.3
- next-themes 0.3
- radix-ui
- shadcn/ui
